import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ id: '', productName: '', price: '', category: '', details: [{ color: '', size: '', quantity: '', }], description: '', imagePath: [] }); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { data } = useSelector(state => state.listCategory); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.getListCategories()); }, [dispatch]) const handleChangeColor = (e, index) => { } const handleChangeSize = (e, index) => { } const handleChangeQuantity = (e, index) => { } return (

setState({ ...state, productName: e.target.value })} />
setState({ ...state, price: e.target.value })} />
handleChangeColor(e, index)} />

setState({ ...state, imagePath: [...state.imagePath, ...[e.target.files[0].name]] })} />
